DataElement.preferredName: Patient Induction Therapy Delay From Initiation Chemotherapy Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no indicator of whether or not the patient had delays in induction therapy that resulted in completion of induction greater than or equal to 28 weeks from initiation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Induction Therapy Delay From Initiation Chemotherapy
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The first choice of treatment for a particular type of cancer._Time during which some action is awaited; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time; the state of being slower or later._Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point; used to indicate a source, cause, agent, or instrument._The act of starting something; an act that sets in motion some course of events._The use of synthetic or naturally-occurring chemicals for the treatment of diseases.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Induction Therapy Delay From Initiation Chemotherapy
Property.preferredDefinition: The first choice of treatment for a particular type of cancer.:Time during which some action is awaited; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time; the state of being slower or later.:Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point; used to indicate a source, cause, agent, or instrument.:The act of starting something; an act that sets in motion some course of events.:The use of synthetic or naturally-occurring chemicals for the treatment of diseases.

Concepts.definition: The first choice of treatment for a particular type of cancer.
Time during which some action is awaited; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time; the state of being slower or later.
Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point; used to indicate a source, cause, agent, or instrument.
The act of starting something; an act that sets in motion some course of events.
The use of synthetic or naturally-occurring chemicals for the treatment of diseases.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results or effects (does not include CTC Adverse Events) of therapeutic agents or procedures administered to the patient.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
